verses.verse: You <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> my <S%G5043>son,<s%> be <S%G1743>strong<s%> in the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And the things that you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of me <S%G1223>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> the <S%G5023>same<s%> <S%G3908>commit<s%> you to <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> shall be <S%G2425>able<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
You <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2553>endure<s%> <S%G2553>hardness,<s%> as a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4754>wars<s%> <S%G1707>entangles<s%> himself with the <S%G4230>affairs<s%> of this <S%G979>life;<s%> that he may <S%G700>please<s%> him who has <S%G4758>chosen<s%> him to be a <S%G4758>soldier.<s%>
And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G118>strive<s%> for masteries, yet is he not <S%G4737>crowned,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> he <S%G118>strive<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully.<s%>
The <S%G1092>farmer<s%> that <S%G2872>labors<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3335>partaker<s%> of the <S%G2590>fruits.<s%>
<S%G3539>Consider<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say;<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> you <S%G4907>understanding<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G2098>gospel:<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> I <S%G2553>suffer<s%> <S%G2553>trouble,<s%> as an <S%G2557>evil<s%> <S%G2557>doer,<s%> even to <S%G1199>bonds;<s%> but the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G1210>bound.<s%>

Therefore I <S%G5278>endure<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things for the <S%G1588>elect's<s%> sakes, that they may <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5177>obtain<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> with <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
It is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying:<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> we be <S%G4880>dead<s%> with him, we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4800>live<s%> with him:
<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G5278>suffer,<s%> we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4821>reign<s%> with him: <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G720>deny<s%> him, he <S%G2548>also<s%> will <S%G720>deny<s%> us:
<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G569>believe<s%> not, yet he <S%G3306>stays<s%> <S%G4103>faithful:<s%> he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

Of <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G5279>put<s%> them in <S%G5279>remembrance,<s%> <S%G1263>charging<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that they <S%G3054>strive<s%> not about <S%G3054>words<s%> to <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G5539>profit,<s%> but to the <S%G2692>subverting<s%> of the <S%G191>hearers.<s%>

<S%G4704>Study<s%> to <S%G3936>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G2040>workman<s%> that <S%G422>needs<s%> not to be <S%G422>ashamed,<s%> rightly <S%G3718>dividing<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth.<s%>
But <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> and <S%G2757>vain<s%> <S%G2757>babblings:<s%> for they will <S%G4298>increase<s%> to <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness.<s%>
And their <S%G3056>word<s%> will <S%G3542>eat<s%> <S%G2192><s%> as does a <S%G1044>canker:<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> and <S%G5372>Philetus;<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> have <S%G795>erred,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> is <S%G1096>past<s%> <S%G2235>already;<s%> and <S%G396>overthrow<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5100>some.<s%>

<S%G3305>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G4731>sure,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> them that are his. And, Let <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G3687>names<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> from <S%G93>iniquity.<s%>

But in a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> there are not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> and of <S%G693>silver,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%> and of <S%G3749>earth;<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G3588>some<s%> to <S%G819>dishonor.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1571>purge<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> from <S%G5130>these,<s%> he shall be a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> to <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> and <S%G2173>meet<s%> for the <S%G1203>master's<s%> use, and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

<S%G5343>Flee<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G3512>youthful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts:<s%> but <S%G1377>follow<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G26>charity,<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> with them that <S%G1941>call<s%> <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out of a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
But <S%G3474>foolish<s%> and <S%G521>unlearned<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%> <S%G3868>avoid,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that they do <S%G1080>engender<s%> <S%G3163>strifes.<s%>

And the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> not <S%G3164>strive;<s%> but be <S%G2261>gentle<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G1317>apt<s%> to <S%G1317>teach,<s%> <S%G420>patient,<s%>

In <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G3811>instructing<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> that <S%G475>oppose<s%> themselves; <S%G3379>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3379>peradventure<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> them <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth;<s%>
And that they may <S%G366>recover<s%> themselves out of the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> who are <S%G2221>taken<s%> <S%G2221>captive<s%> by him <S%G1519>at<s%> his <S%G2307>will.<s%>
